ingredients.name: dark chocolate (preferably at least 70 percent cacao), finely chopped

tasks: Add 1.5 cup of all-purpose flour in a large bowl
Add 1 cup of sugar
Add 0.75 tsp bicarbonate soda
Add 0.5 tsp salt
Mix well and set aside
Add 0.5 cup sunflower oil in a glass and set aside
Add 1 tsp vanilla extract in a pinch bowl set aside
Add 2 tsp white vinegar in a pinch bowl and set aside
Add 0.5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder in a small bowl and set aside
Warm 1 cup of water and pour it in the bowl with the cocoa powder
Mix until dissolved
Pre heat the oven at 180 degrees,  (or 160 degrees if fan oven)
Make a hole in the middle of the flour mixture
Add the oil
Add the cocoa mixture
Add the vanilla extract
Mix until homogeneous
Add the white vinegar
Mix just until combined
Then immediately pour the mixture into the cake pan
Bake until inserting a knife in the cake center comes out clean

ingredients.name: frozen ripe banana, cut into chunks before freezing
frozen ripe banana, cut into chunks before freezing

tasks: Add 1 cup/100 g Frozen Blueberries in a blender
Add 0.5 cup/110 g fresh or frozen pitted cherries
Add 1 frozen ripe banana, cut into chunks before freezing
Add 1 tbsp ground flaxseeds (or linseeds)
Add 1 tbsp almond butter (or peanut butter)
Add 1 cup/22.5 g raw spinach leaves
Add 1.5 cup cup (360 ml) water
Blend all the ingredients until smooth and creamy for about 1 minute
Add more water if you prefer a thinner consistency
Serve immediately

ingredients.name: frozen ripe banana, cut into chunks before freezing
sugar (optional, depending on the sweetness of the fruit)
frozen ripe banana, cut into chunks before freezing
sugar (optional, depending on the sweetness of the fruit)

tasks: Add 1 frozen ripe banana, cut into chunks before freezing in a blender
Add 0.5 cup/35 g Frozen Blueberries
Add 2 tbsps unsweetened cocoa powder
Add 1 tbsp ground flaxseeds (or linseeds)
Add 1 tsp vanilla extract
Add 1 tbsp almond butter (or peanut butter)
Add 1 tbsp sugar (optional, depending on the sweetness of the fruit)
Add 1 cup/22.5 g raw spinach leaves
Add 3 to 4 ice cubes (optional)
Add 1.5 cup cup (360 ml) water
Blend all the ingredients until thick and smooth for about 1 minute
For thinner texture, add less ice (if using) or more water
Serve immediately
Place a pot of water on medium heat and set aside to boil
Place 100g cashews into a bowl and cover with hot water for 5 minutes
Add 400 g of macaroni to a bowl and set aside
Add 300 ml of plant-based milk into a bowl and set aside
Add 6 tbsp nutritional yeast in a pinch bowl and set aside
Add 2 tsp dijon mustard in a pinch bowl and set aside
Add 1 tbsp olive oil in a pinch bowl and set aside
Pre-heat your oven to 200C
In the pot with boiling water, add salt
Add the macaroni
Boil for ten minutes
Drain the cashews and add them to a blender cup
Add the plant-based milk to the blender cup with the cashews
Add the nutritional yeast
Add the dijon mustard
Add the olive oil
Add a pinch of salt
Add a pinch of pepper
Blend until smooth and set aside
Drain the pasta and add to a baking dish
Pour over the cheese sauce and mix
Sprinkle the vegan grated cheese on top if using
Place the pasta in the oven for 20 min at 200 C
Serve the mac 'n' cheese in a plate
Sprinkle with some paprika and serve immediately
Enjoy :)
Add 2 tbsp oil in a pinch bowl and set aside
Add 2 tsp chopped garlic in a separate pinch bowl and set aside
Add 1-2 tsp chopped red chillies in the same pinch bowl and set aside
Add 1 tbsp ground coriander in a pinch bowl and set aside
Peel and slice an onion and set aside in a bowl
Wash 1 eggplant, cut it into 1 cm cubes and place it in a large bowl
Wash 1 zucchini, cut it into small cubes and place it in the same bowl
Wash 1 bell pepper, cut it into small cubes and place it in the same bowl
You will no longer need the knife and cutting board
Open and set aside 1 tin (400 g) of tomatoes
Open and set aside 1 tin (400 ml) of coconut milk
Open 1 tin (400 g) of chickpeas, drain and rinse and place in a small bowl
Add 1 cup (200 ml) of water in a glass and set aside
Add 100 g ground almonds in a small bowl and set aside
Squeeze 1 lime and set aside in a pinch bowl

images.alt: tomatoes, coconut milk, chickpeas, water, almonds and lime juice

tasks: Place a large pot over high heat
Add the oil
Add the chopped garlic
Add the chopped red chillies
Sauté for 1-2 minutes
Add the onion
Add the ground coriander
Stir and sauté for 1-2 minutes
Add the vegetables
Stir and sauté for 4 minutes

links.heading: From Step 4
links.name: Tomatoes, coconut milk, chickpeas, water, almonds, lime juice

tasks: Add the tinned tomatoes
Add the coconut milk
Add the chickpeas
Add the water
Add the ground almonds
Add the lime juice
Salt and pepper to taste. Make sure to add enough salt
Stir well
Cook on a high heat for approximately 10 minutes until the chilli thickens

items.name: pinch bowls
items.notes: to hold the olive oil and garlic

items.name: small bowls
items.notes: to hold the onions and lentils

tasks: This step is optional, you can have the soup without the cauliflower
Chop the cauliflower into florets
Place on a baking tray
Sprinkle olive oil along with the smoked paprika until lightly covered
Place in the oven for 45 minutes (make sure to turn half way)
Add 2 tbsps olive oil in a pinch bowl and set aside
Peel and crush 2 garlic cloves. Place them in a pinch bowl and set aside
Peel and slice 1 onion and place it in a small bowl and set aside
Peel and chop the sweet potato into small cubes and place in a large bowl
Thinly slice the carrots and place them the same bowl
Thinly slice the celery stalcks and place them the same bowl and set aside
Prepare 1.5 L stock according to the pack instructions and set aside
Add 1 cup of lentils in a small bowl and set aside
Place a large plan over medium heat
Add the olive oil
Add the garlic
Add a pinch of salt and pepper and stir well
Once the onion is sizzling add the onion
Cook for 2 minute until the onion softens
Add the sweet potato, carrots and celery
Add a pinch of salt and pepper
Fry for for 5-10 minutes until the vegetables have softened
Add the stock
Add the lentils
Bring to a boil
Once boiling place the lid on the pan
Reduce to a simmer for 20 minutes
Then remove and set aside
Assemble the soup using the cauliflower
Enjoy!
Place a small pot of water on medium-high heat and set aside to boil
Add 60 ml (or 0.25 cup) extra-virgin olive oil in pinch bowl and set aside
Finely dice 0.5 onion and add it to a small bowl
Chop 3 spring onions (scallions), make sure to include the white and green parts. Add them to the same small bowl and set aside
Finely chop 1 clove garlic and set aside in a pinch bowl
In a small bowl add 330 g (or 1.5 cups) arborio (risotto) rice and set aside
In small bowl add 80 g (0.5 cup) peas

ingredients.name: Fresh green chilli
ingredients.notes: Optional. Use as much as you like it

tasks: In a a pinch bowl add 60 ml extra-virgin olive oil and set aside
In a small bowl add 10g (0.5 cup) mint leaves
Add 10g (0.5 cup) flat-leaft parsley leaves in the same bowl
Peel a garlic clove and add it to the same bowl
Zest the lemon in the same bowl
Then squeeze the lemon juice in a pinch bowl

ingredients.name: broccoli head
ingredients.notes: You can also use frozen broccoli florets

tasks: Trim 1 broccoli head into florets, do not include the stalk
In the pot with boiling water, add salt
Add the broccoli and boil for 3-4 minutes
Do not overcook, you want to keep that bright green colour
Drain the broccoli and run it under cold water until cool
Set aside to drain
In the same pot that you used for the broccoli, prepare 1-1.25 litres (4-5 cups) vegetable stock following the instructions on the package
Set aside on medium heat and continue to next step

ingredients.name: large saucepan
ingredients.notes: You can also use a shallow casserole dish

tasks: In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat
Add the onions
Add a big pinch of salt
Fry for 2 minutes or until the onions begin to soften
Add the garlic and cook for a few seconds
Add the rice
Stir well to coat and cook over low heat until the grains begin to look a little translucent around the edges
Slowly begin to add the warm stock to the rice - about 250ml (or 1 cup) at a time
If you don’t need all the stock, don’t use it. Different brands of rice need slightly different amounts of stock, so use your best judgement
Make sure to stir regularly, over low heat until the rice is just cooked through and creamy
Set the the rice aside to cook for approximately 25 minutes
Make sure to not overcook

items.name: Blender
items.notes: You can also use a food processor

tasks: In a blender, add the broccoli
Add the pesto ingredients
Blend until smooth, approximately 1 minutes
Once the rice is cooked add the peas
Cook for 2 minutes
Remove the risotto from the heat
Add the pesto and stir
Serve the rissoto in a plate
Sprinkle with some vegan parmesan
Add a pinch of pepper
